anya-e0201n1:985: Vacanasiliṭṭhatte pana sati visadisaliṅgavacanānampi padānaṃ aññamaññasaṃyogo hoti, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā dī. ni. 3.145, cattāro sammappadhānā dī. ni. 3.145, tayomahābhūtā, tayo mahābhūte paṭṭhā. 1.1.58, sabbe mālā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, sabbe kaññā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, sabbe ratanā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, sabbe yānā upenti maṃ dhu. 3.6, avijjāya sati saṅkhārā honti, saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇaṃ hoti saṃ. ni. 2.50 iccādi.
anya-e0201n1:986: Gāthāsu vipallāsāpi bahulaṃ dissanti, aññe dhammāni desenti, evaṃ dhammāni sutvāna, satañca dhammāni sukittitāni sutvā, atthāni cintayitvāna, uttamatthāni tayi labhimhā, kiṃ tvaṃ atthāni jānāsi, iccheyyāmi bhante sattaputtāni, siviputtāni avhaya jā. 2.22.2235, puttadārāni posenti, balībaddāni soḷasa iccādi.
anya-e0201n1:989: Pañcādīhi aṭṭhārasantehi saṅkhyāsaddehi yonaṃ ṭa hoti.
anya-e0201n1:990: Pañca itthiyo, pañca purisā, purise, pañca cittāni, cha itthiyo.
anya-e0201n1:991: Ḷāgame pana ‘‘itthibhāvā na muccissaṃ, chaḷāni gatiyo imā’’ti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n1:992: Cha purisā, cha purise, cha cittāni. Evaṃ satta, aṭṭha, nava, dasa, ekādasa…pe… aṭṭhārasa.
anya-e0201n1:994: Su, naṃ, hisu pañcādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ assa attameva hoti, na ettaṃ vā dīghattaṃ vā hoti.
anya-e0201n1:995: Pañcahi, pañcannaṃ, pañcasu, chahi, channaṃ, chasu, sattahi, sattannaṃ, sattasu, aṭṭhahi, aṭṭhannaṃ, aṭṭhasu, navahi, navannaṃ, navasu, dasahi, dasannaṃ, dasasu, ekādasahi, ekādasannaṃ, ekādasasu…pe… aṭṭhārasahi, aṭṭhārasannaṃ, aṭṭhārasasu.
anya-e0201n1:997: ‘Itthiyamatvā’ti vīsa, tiṃsa, cattālīsa, paññāsehi āpaccayo, mahāvuttinā simhi rasso silopo ca, ‘niggahīta’nti vikappena niggahītāgamo, vikappena aṃlopo, nādīnaṃ ekavacanānaṃ yādeso, vīsa itthiyo, vīsaṃ itthiyo, vīsa purisā, vīsaṃ purisā, vīsa purise, vīsaṃ purise, vīsa cittāni, vīsaṃ cittāni, vīsāya itthīhi kammaṃ kataṃ, vīsāya purisehi kammaṃ kataṃ, vīsāya kulehi kammaṃ kataṃ, vīsāya itthīnaṃ, purisānaṃ, kulānaṃ, sattamiyaṃ vīsāya itthīsu, purisesu, kulesu.
anya-e0201n1:998: Tipaccaye vīsati, tiṃsatisaddāpi saṭṭhi, sattati, asīti, navutisaddā viya niccaṃ itthi liṅgekavacanantā eva, si, aṃlopo, vīsati itthiyo, vīsati purisā, purise, vīsati kulāni, vīsatiyā itthīhi, itthīnaṃ, purisehi, purisānaṃ, kulehi, kulānaṃ , vīsatiyā, vīsatiyaṃ itthi, purisa, kulesu, evaṃ yāvanavutiyā veditabbā. Vaggabhede pana sati bahuvacanampi vikappena dissati, dve vīsatiyo iccādi.
anya-e0201n1:999: Sataṃ, sahassaṃ, dasasahassaṃ, satasahassaṃ, dasasatasahassanti ime napuṃsakaliṅgāyeva. Saṅkhyeyyapadhāne pana itthiliṅge vattabbe sahassī, dasasahassī, satasahassīti itthiliṅgaṃ bhavati. Vaggabhede pana dve satāni, tīṇi satāni, dve sahassāni, tīṇi sahassāni iccādīni bhavanti. Koṭi, pakoṭi, koṭipakoṭi, akkhobhiṇīsaddā itthiliṅgā eva. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ yāvaasaṅkhyeyyā napuṃsakameva.
anya-e0201n1:1000: Sahassaṃ kāsi nāma, dasasahassaṃ nahutaṃ nāma, satasahassaṃ lakkhaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n1:1001: Duvidhaṃ padhānaṃ saṅkhyāpadhānaṃ, saṅkhyeyyapadhānañca. Purisānaṃ vīsati hoti, purisānaṃ navuti hoti, purisānaṃ sataṃ hoti, sahassaṃ hoti iccādi saṅkhyāpadhānaṃ nāma, vīsati purisā, navuti purisā, sataṃ purisā, sahassaṃ purisā iccādi saṅkhyeyyapadhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e0201n1:1002: Etthapi vīsatisaddo itthiliṅgekavacano eva. Sata, sahassasaddā napuṃsakekavacanā eva. Saṅkhyāsaddānaṃ pana padavidhānañca guṇavidhānañca samāsakaṇḍe āgamissati.
anya-e0201n1:1008: Yosu savibhattissa amhassa kamena mayaṃ, asmā honti vā.
anya-e0201n1:1013: Simhi ca aṃmhi ca savibhattissa tumhassa tuvaṃ, tvaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n1:1014: Tuvaṃ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuvaṃ mārābhibhū muni theragā. 839, tvaṃ no satthā anuttaro, tumhe gacchatha, tuvaṃ passati, tvaṃ passati.
anya-e0201n1:1015: 255.Aṃmhi taṃ maṃ tavaṃ mamaṃka. 143-4; rū. 234-5; nī. 322.
anya-e0201n1:1016: Aṃmhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ taṃ, maṃ, tavaṃ, mamaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n1:1017: Maṃ passati, mamaṃ passati, taṃ passati, tavaṃ passati, amhe passati, tumhe passati.
anya-e0201n1:1019: Dutiyāyomhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ ṅānubandhā aṃ, ākaṃādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n1:1020: Amhaṃ, amhākaṃ passati, tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ passati.
anya-e0201n1:1022: Nā , smāsu savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ tayā, mayā honti.
anya-e0201n1:1023: Mayā kataṃ, tayā kataṃ, mayā apeti, tayā apeti.
anya-e0201n1:1025: Tayā, tayīnaṃ tassa tva hoti vā.
anya-e0201n1:1026: Tvayā kataṃ, tvayā apeti, amhehi kataṃ, tumhehi kataṃ.
anya-e0201n1:1029: Mama dīyate, mayhaṃ dīyate, tava dīyate, tuyhaṃ dīyate.
anya-e0201n1:1031: Naṃ, sesu savibhattissa amhassa kamena asmākaṃ, mamaṃ honti.
anya-e0201n1:1034: Naṃmhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ ṅānubandhā aṃ, ākaṃādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n1:1035: Amhaṃ dīyate, amhākaṃ dīyate, tumhaṃ dīyate, tumhākaṃ dīyate. Pañcamiyaṃ mayā, tayā, tvayā, pubbe vuttāva.
anya-e0201n1:1038: Tvamhā apeti, amhehi, tumhehi, mama, mamaṃ, mayhaṃ, tava, tuyhaṃ, amhaṃ, amhākaṃ, asmākaṃ, tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ.
anya-e0201n1:1040: Smiṃmhi savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ tayi, mayi honti.
anya-e0201n1:1041: Tayi, mayi, tvatte tvayi, amhesu, tumhesu.
anya-e0201n1:1045: Mahāvuttinā yo, hisu amhassa asmādeso, yonaṃ ettañca, asmā gacchāma, asme passati, asmāhi kataṃ, asmākaṃ dīyate, asmāhi apeti, asmākaṃ dhanaṃ, asmāsu ṭhitaṃ. ‘‘Asmābhijappanti janā anekā’’ti jā. 1.7.68 pāḷi-asme abhijappanti patthentīti attho. ‘‘Asmābhi pariciṇṇosi, mettacittā hi nāyakā’’ti apa. therī 2.2.230 therīpāḷi – ‘pariciṇṇo’ti paricārito.
anya-e0201n1:1046: Catutthiyaṃ asmākaṃ adhipannānaṃ, khamassu rājakuñjara jā. 2.21.181 – ‘adhipannāna’nti dukkhābhibhūtānaṃ.
anya-e0201n1:1047: Chaṭṭhiyaṃ esasmākaṃ kule dhammo jā. 1.4.147, esā asmākaṃ dhammatā.
anya-e0201n1:1048: Sattamiyaṃ yaṃ kiccaṃ parame mitte, katamasmāsu taṃ tayā. Pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tvamhā, bhattirasmāsu yā tava jā. 2.21.81 – tattha ‘yaṃ kicca’nti yaṃ kammaṃ kattabbaṃ, tava asmāsu yā bhatti, tāya mayaṃ tvamhā nissaṃsayataṃ pattāti attho.
anya-e0201n1:1050: Apādādimhi pavattānaṃ padato paresaṃ ekavākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhā’mhānaṃ vidhi hoti. Adhikārasuttamidaṃ.
anya-e0201n1:1052: Pañcamīvajjitesu yo, naṃ, hisu paresu apādādopavattānaṃ padato paresaṃ ekavākye ṭhitānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhasaddānaṃ vo, no honti vā.
anya-e0201n1:1053: Gacchatha vo, gacchatha tumhe, gacchāma no, gacchāma amhe, passeyya vo, passeyya tumhe, passeyya no, passeyya amhe, dīyate vo, dīyate tumhākaṃ, dīyate no, dīyate amhākaṃ, dhanaṃ vo, dhanaṃ tumhākaṃ, dhanaṃ no, dhanaṃ amhākaṃ, kataṃ vo puññaṃ, kataṃ tumhehi puññaṃ, kataṃ no puññaṃ, kataṃ amhehi puññaṃ.
anya-e0201n1:1054: Apañcamyāti kiṃ? Nissaṭaṃ tumhehi, nissaṭaṃ amhehi.
anya-e0201n1:1055: Apādādotveva? Balañca bhikkhūnamanuppadinnaṃ, tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakaṃ khu. pā. 7.12.
anya-e0201n1:1057: Ekavākyetveva? Devadatto tiṭṭhati gāme, tumhe tiṭṭhatha nagare.
anya-e0201n1:1060: Nā , sesu tādisānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumha, amhasaddānaṃ te, me honti vā.
anya-e0201n1:1061: Kataṃ te puññaṃ, kataṃ tayā puññaṃ, kataṃ me puññaṃ, kataṃ mayā puññaṃ, dinnaṃ te vatthaṃ, dinnaṃ tuyhaṃ vatthaṃ, dinnaṃ me vatthaṃ, dinnaṃ mayhaṃ vatthaṃ, idaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ tava raṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ me raṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ mama raṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0201n1:1063: Anvādesaṭṭhāne tumhā’mhasaddānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā niccaṃ bhavanti punabbidhānā.
anya-e0201n1:1064: Gāmo tumhākaṃ pariggaho, atho nagarampi vo pariggaho. Evaṃ sesesu.
anya-e0201n1:1065: 269.Sapubbā paṭhamantā vā‘saṃpubbā paṭhamanthā vā’ (mūlapāṭhe) caṃ. 6.1.21; pā. 8.1.26.
anya-e0201n1:1066: Saṃvijjati pubbapadaṃ assāti sapubbaṃ, sapubbā paṭhamantapadamhā paresaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tumhā’mhasaddānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā vikappena honti anvādesaṭṭhānepi.
anya-e0201n1:1067: Gāme paṭo tumhākaṃ, atho nagare kambalaṃ vo, atho nagare kambalaṃ tumhākaṃ vā. Evaṃ sesesu.
anya-e0201n1:1069: Ca, vā, ha, aha, evasaddehi yoge tumhā’mhānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā na honti.
anya-e0201n1:1070: Gāmo tava ca mama ca pariggaho, gāmo tava vā mama vā pariggaho iccādi.
anya-e0201n1:1071: Cādiyogeti kiṃ? Gāmo ca te pariggaho, nagarañca me pariggaho.
anya-e0201n1:1073: Ālocanaṃ olokanaṃ, ālocanato aññasmiṃ dassanatthe payujjamāne tumhā’mhānaṃ vo, no, te, meādesā na honti.
anya-e0201n1:1074: Gāmo tumhe uddissa āgato, gāmo amhe uddissa āgato – ‘gāmo’ti gāmavāsī mahājano.
anya-e0201n1:1075: Anālocaneti kiṃ? Gāmo vo passati, gāmo no passati.
anya-e0201n1:1077: Āmantanabhūtaṃ pubbapadaṃ asantaṃ viya hoti, padatoti saṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
anya-e0201n1:1080: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte pade sati pubbaṃ sāmaññavacanabhūtaṃ āmantanapadaṃ asantaṃ viya na hoti, padatoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0201n1:1082: Sāmaññavacananti kiṃ? Māṇavaka devadatta! Tuyhaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0201n1:1083: Ekattheti kiṃ? Devadatta! Yaññadatta! Tumhākaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0201n1:1085: Bahūsu janesu pavattamānaṃ sāmaññavacanabhūtampi āmantanapadaṃ ekatthe pade sati asantaṃ viya na hoti vā.
anya-e0201n1:1086: Brāhmaṇā guṇavanto vo pariggaho, brāhmaṇā guṇavanto tumhākaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0201n1:1090: Vibhatyatthānaṃ jotakattā vibhattiṭṭhāne ṭhitā paccayā vibhattipaccayā.
anya-e0201n1:1093: Tomhi dīghānaṃ rasso, kaññato, rattito, itthito, dhenuto. Mahāvuttinā tomhi mātāpitūnaṃ ittaṃ, mātito, pitito, vadhuto, purisato, munito, daṇḍito , bhikkhuto, satthārato, kattuto, gotrabhuto, sabbato, yato, tato.
anya-e0201n1:1096: Ito, ato, etto, kutoti ete saddā topaccayantā nipaccante.
anya-e0201n1:1097: Imamhā imehīti vā ito, etasmā etehīti vā ato, etto, kasmā kehīti vā kuto. Ettha ca imamhā, imehītiādikaṃ atthavākyaṃ disvā pakatiliṅgaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iminā suttena imassa ittaṃ, etassa attaṃ ettañca, ‘saramhā dve’ti esaramhā dvittaṃ, kiṃsaddassa kuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesesu nipātanesu.
anya-e0201n1:1102: Ubhato gāmaṃ gāmassa ubhosu passesūti attho.
anya-e0201n1:1106: Ādito , majjhato, purato, passato, piṭṭhito, orato, parato, pacchato, puratthimato, dakkhiṇatoiccādīsu bahulaṃ sattamyatthe dissati.
anya-e0201n1:1107: Tathā tatiyatthepi rūpaṃ attato samanupassati saṃ. ni. 3.44, pañcakkhandhe aniccato vipassati iccādi.
anya-e0201n1:1108: Yatonidānaṃ su. ni. 275, yatvādhikaraṇaṃ, yatodakaṃ tadādittamiccādīsu jā. 1.9.58 paṭhamatthe icchanti.
anya-e0201n1:1109: Ito ehi, ito balāke āgaccha, caṇḍo me vāyaso sakhā iccādīsu dutiyatthe.
anya-e0201n1:1110: Paratoghoso, nādiṭṭhā parato dosaṃ iccādīsu chaṭṭhyatthe.
anya-e0201n1:1111: 279.Sabbādito sattamyā tratthāka. 249; rū. 266; nī. 494; caṃ. 4.1.10; pā. 5.3.10.
anya-e0201n1:1112: Sabbādināmakehi sabbanāmehi sattamiyā atthe tra, tthā honti.
anya-e0201n1:1113: Sabbasmiṃ sabbesūti vā sabbatra, sabbattha, sabbassaṃ sabbāsu vātipi. Evaṃ kataratra, katarattha, aññatra, aññattha iccādi.
anya-e0201n1:1116: Kattha, ettha, kutra, atra, tva, iha, idhāti ete saddāttha, tra,va ha, dhāpaccayantā sattamyatthe sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n1:1117: Kasmiṃ kesūti vā kattha, kutra, kva. ‘Kuva’ntipi sijjhati, ‘‘kuvaṃ sattassa kārako, kuvaṃ satto samuppanno saṃ. ni. 1.171, kuvaṃ asissaṃ, kuvaṃ khādissa’’nti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n1:1118: Etasmiṃ etesūti vā ettha, atra, imasmiṃ imesūti vā iha, idha.
anya-e0201n1:1121: Namo te buddha vīra’tthu, vippamuttosi sabbadhi saṃ. ni. 1.90.
anya-e0201n1:1127: Tahiṃ, tahaṃ. Dutiyatthepi dissati ‘‘tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento gacchatī’’ti.
anya-e0201n1:1129: Kiṃmhā sattamyatthe hiṃ, taṃ hoti. Kiṃssa kuttaṃ kattañca hoti.
anya-e0201n1:1130: Kuhiṃ gacchati, kuhaṃ gacchati. Kahaṃ ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtaka saṃ. ni. 2.63. Kuhiñci, kuhiñcananti dve ci, cana-nipātantā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n1:1134: Sabba, eka, añña, ya, tasaddehi kāle dā hoti.
anya-e0201n1:1135: Sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbadā, ekasmiṃ kāle ekadā, aññasmiṃ kāle aññadā, yasmiṃ kāle yadā, tasmiṃ kāle tadā.
anya-e0201n1:1137: Etepi sattamyatthe kāle dā, dhunā, dānipaccayantā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n1:1138: Kiṃsmiṃ kāle kadā, kudā, sabbasmiṃ kāle sadā, imasmiṃ kāle adhunā, idāni.
anya-e0201n1:1140: Etepi kāle jja, jju, rahi, raha paccayantā sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n1:1142: Samāne kāle sajju-‘samāne’ti vijjamāne. Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajju khīraṃva muccati dha. pa. 71, sajjukaṃ pāhesi – tattha ‘sajjū’ti tasmiṃ divase.
anya-e0201n1:1144: Imasmiṃ kāle etarahi, kiṃsmiṃ kāle karaha. Kutoci, kvaci, katthaci, kuhiñci, kadāci, karahacisaddā pana ci-nipātantā honti, tathā yato kutoci, yattha katthaci, yadā kadācīti. Kiñcanaṃ, kuhiñcanaṃ, kudācananti cana-nipātantāti.
anya-e0201n1:1149: Chabbidhāni abyayapadāni upasaggapadaṃ, nipātapadaṃ, vibhattipaccayantapadaṃ, abyayībhāvasamāsapadaṃ, abyayataddhitapadaṃ, tvādipaccayantapadanti. Byayo vuccati vikāro, nānāliṅgavibhattivacanehi natthi rūpabyayo etesanti abyayā, asaṅkhyāti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0201n1:1150: Tattha vibhattipaccayantapadato puna vibhattuppatti nāma natthi. Abyayībhāvasamāsamhi vibhattīnaṃ vidhi samāsakaṇḍe vakkhati, tasmā tāni dve ṭhapetvā sesāni cattāri idha vuccante.
anya-e0201n1:1152: Asaṅkhyehi padehi yathārahaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti, kehici padehi paṭhamāya lopo, kehici padehi dutiyāya lopo…pe… kehici sattamiyā, kehici dvinnaṃ, kehici tissannaṃ…pe… kehici sattannanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0201n1:1153: Tattha āvuso, bho, bhanteiccādīhi āmantananipātehi atthi, natthi, sakkā, labbhā, siyā, siyuṃ, sādhu, tuṇhīiccādīhi ca paṭhamāya lopo.
anya-e0201n1:1154: Ciraṃ, cirassaṃ, niccaṃ, satataṃ, abhiṇhaṃ, abhikkhaṇaṃ, muhuttaṃ iccādīhi accantasaṃyogalakkhaṇe dutiyāya.
anya-e0201n1:1155: Yathā, tathā, sabbathā, sabbaso, musā, micchāiccādīhi tatiyāya.
anya-e0201n1:1158: Pure, purā, pacchā, uddhaṃ, upari, adho, heṭṭhā, antarā, anto, raho, āvi, hiyyo, suveiccādīhi sattamiyā lopo.
anya-e0201n1:1159: Namosaddamhā ‘‘namo te buddha vīra’tthū’’ti ettha paṭhamāya. ‘‘Namo karohi nāgassā’’ti ettha dutiyāya.
anya-e0201n1:1160: Sayaṃsaddamhā ‘‘kusūlo sayameva bhijjate’’ti ettha paṭhamāya. ‘‘Sayaṃ kataṃ sukhadukkha’’nti dī. ni. 3.191, 193 ettha tatiyāya, iccādinā yathārahavibhāgo veditabbo.
anya-e0201n1:1161: Iti, evaṃsaddehi payogānurūpaṃ sattannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0201n1:1163: Rūpasiddhiyaṃ pana ‘‘tehi paṭhamekavacanameva bhavatī’’ti rū. 131 (piṭṭhe) vuttaṃ.
anya-e0201n1:1164: Tattha ‘‘abhikkamati, abhidhammo’’ iccādīsu dhātuliṅgāni upecca tesaṃ atthaṃ nānāppakāraṃ karontā sajjanti saṅkharontīti upasaggā. Te hi kvaci tadatthaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ karonti ‘‘jānāti, pajānāti, sañjānāti, avajānāti, abhijānāti, parijānāti, susīlo, dussīlo, suvaṇṇo, dubbaṇṇo, surājā, durājā’’ iccādīsu.
anya-e0201n1:1165: Kvaci tadatthaṃ nānāppakāraṃ katvā vibhajjanti ‘‘gacchati, āgacchati, uggacchati, ogacchati’’iccādīsu.
anya-e0201n1:1166: Kvaci tadatthaṃ bādhetvā tappaṭiviruddhe vā tadaññasmiṃ vā atthe tāni yojenti.
anya-e0201n1:1168: Jeti, parājeti, omuñcati, paṭimuñcati, gilati, uggilati, nimmujjati, ummujjati, dhammo, uddhammoiccādi.
anya-e0201n1:1170: Dadāti, ādadāti, dadhāti, vidheti, pidheti, nidheti, sandhiyati, saddahati, abhidhātiiccādi.
anya-e0201n1:1171: Kvaci pana padasobhaṇaṃ katvā tadatthaṃ anuvattanti, ‘‘vijjati, saṃvijjati, labhati, paṭilabhati’’ iccādi.
anya-e0201n1:1172: Te vīsati honti-pa, ā, u, o, du, ni, vi, su, saṃ, ati, adhi, anu, apa, api, abhi, ava, upa, pati, parā, pari.
anya-e0201n1:1173: Kaccāyane pana osaddo avakāriyamattanti taṃ aggahetvā nīsaddaṃ gaṇhāti, idha pana nīsaddo nissa dīghamattanti taṃ aggahetvā osaddaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0201n1:1175: Pakāratthe-paññā. Ādikamme-vippakataṃ. Padhāne-paṇītaṃ. Issariye-pabhū. Antobhāve-pakkhittaṃ, passāso. Viyoge-pavāso. Tappare-pācariyo. Tadanubandhe-putto, paputto, nattā, panattā. Bhusatthe-pavaḍḍho. Sambhave-pabhavati. Tittiyaṃ-pahutaṃ annaṃ. Anāvile-pasanno. Patthanāyaṃ-paṇidhānaṃ.
anya-e0201n1:1177: Abhimukhe-āgacchati. Uddhaṃkamme-ārohati. Mariyādāyaṃ-āpabbatā khettaṃ. Abhividhimhi-ābrahmalokā kittisaddo. Pattiyaṃ-āpanno. Icchāyaṃ-ākaṅkhā. Parissajane-āliṅgati. Ādikamme-ārambho. Gahaṇe-ādīyati. Nivāse-āvasatho. Samīpe-āsannaṃ. Avhāne-āmantanaṃ.
anya-e0201n1:1179: Uggate-uggacchati . Uddhaṃkamme-uṭṭhāti. Padhāne-uttaro. Viyoge-upavāso. Sambhave-ubbhūto. Atthalābhe-rūpassa uppādo. Sattiyaṃ-ussahati gantuṃ. Sarūpakhyāne-uddeso.
anya-e0201n1:1181: Antobhāve-ocarako, orodho. Adhokamme-okkhitto. Niggahe-ovādo. Antare, dese ca-okāso. Pātubhāve-opapātiko. Yesu atthesu avasaddo vattati, tesupi osaddo vattati.
anya-e0201n1:1183: Asobhaṇe-duggandho. Abhāve-dubbhikkhaṃ, dussīlo, duppañño. Kucchite-dukkaṭaṃ. Asamiddhiyaṃ-dusassaṃ. Kicche-dukkaraṃ. Virūpe-dubbaṇṇo, dummukho.
anya-e0201n1:1185: Nissese-nirutti. Niggate-niyyānaṃ. Nīharaṇe-niddhāraṇaṃ. Antopavesane-nikhāto. Abhāve-nimmakkhikaṃ. Nisedhe-nivāreti. Nikkhante-nibbānaṃ. Pātubhāve-nimmitaṃ. Avadhāraṇe-vinicchayo. Vibhajjane-niddeso. Upamāyaṃ-nidassanaṃ. Upadhāraṇe-nisāmeti. Avasāne-niṭṭhitaṃ. Cheke-nipuṇo.
anya-e0201n1:1187: Visese-vipassati. Vividhe-vicittaṃ. Viruddhe-vivādo. Vigate-vimalo. Viyoge-vippayutto. Virūpe-vippaṭisāro.
anya-e0201n1:1191: Samodhāne-sandhi. Sammā, samatthesu-samādhi, sampayutto. Samantabhāve-saṃkiṇṇo. Saṅgate-samāgamo, saṅkhepe-samāso. Bhusatthe-sāratto. Sahatthe-saṃvāso, sambhogo. Appatthe-samaggho. Pabhave-sambhavo. Abhimukhe-sammukhaṃ. Saṅgahe-saṅgayhati. Pidahane-saṃvuto. Punappunakamme-sandhāvati, saṃsarati. Samiddhiyaṃ-sampanno.
anya-e0201n1:1193: Atikkame-atirocati, accayo, atīto. Atikkante-accantaṃ. Atissaye-atikusalo. Bhusatthe-atikodho. Antokamme-mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā atiharitvā ṭhapeti.
anya-e0201n1:1195: Adhike-adhisīlaṃ. Issare-adhipati, adhibrahmadatte pañcālā. Uparibhāve-adhiseti. Paribhavane-adhibhūto. Ajjhāyane-ajjheti, byākaraṇamadhīte. Adhiṭṭhāne-navakammaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhāti, iddhivikubbanaṃ adhiṭṭhāti. Nicchaye-adhimuccati. Pāpuṇane-bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati, amataṃ adhigacchati.
anya-e0201n1:1197: Anugate-anveti. Anuppacchinne-anusayo. Pacchāsaddatthe-anurathaṃ. Punappunabhāve-anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ, anusaṃvaccharaṃ. Yogyabhāve-anurūpaṃ .Kaniṭṭhabhāve-anubuddho, anuthero. Sesaṃ kārakakaṇḍe vakkhati.
anya-e0201n1:1199: Apagate-apeti, apāyo. Garahe-apagabbho, apasaddo. Vajjane-apasālāya āyanti. Pūjāyaṃ-vuḍḍha-mapacāyanti. Padussane-aparajjhati.
anya-e0201n1:1201: Sambhāvane-apipabbataṃ bhindeyya, merumpi vinivijjheyya. Apekkhāyaṃ-ayampi dhammo aniyato. Samuccaye-itipi arahaṃ, chavimpi dahati, cammampi dahati, maṃsampi dahati. Garahāyaṃ-api amhākaṃ paṇḍitaka. Pucchāyaṃ-api bhante bhikkhaṃ labhittha, api nu tumhe sotukāmāttha.
anya-e0201n1:1203: Abhimukhe-abhikkanto. Visiṭṭhe-abhiññā. Adhike-abhidhammo. Uddhaṃkamme-abhirūhati. Kule-abhijāto. Sāruppe-abhirūpo. Vandane-abhivādeti. Sesaṃ kārakakaṇḍe vakkhati.
anya-e0201n1:1205: Adhobhāge-avakkhitto. Viyoge-avakokilaṃ vanaṃ. Paribhave-avajānāti. Jānane-avagacchati. Suddhiyaṃ-vodāyati, vodānaṃ. Nicchaye-avadhāraṇaṃ. Dese-avakāso. Theyye-avahāro.
anya-e0201n1:1207: Upagame-upanisīdati. Samīpe-upacāro, upanagaraṃ. Upapattiyaṃ-saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. Sadise-upamāṇaṃ, upameyyaṃ. Adhike-upakhāriyaṃ doṇo. Uparibhāve – upasampanno , upacayo. Anasane-upavāso. Dosakkhāne-paraṃ upavadati. Saññāyaṃ-upadhā, upasaggo. Pubbakamme-upakkamo, upahāro. Pūjāyaṃ-buddhaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Gayhākāre-paccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Bhusatthe-upādānaṃ, upāyāso, upanissayo.
anya-e0201n1:1209: Patigate-paccakkhaṃ. Paṭilome-paṭisotaṃ. Paṭiyogimhi-paṭipuggalo. Nisedhe-paṭisedho. Nivatte-paṭikkamati. Sadise-paṭirūpakaṃ. Paṭikamme-rogassa paṭikāro. Ādāne-paṭiggaṇhāti. Paṭibodhe-paṭivedho. Paṭicce-paccayo. Sesaṃ kārakakaṇḍe vakkhati.
anya-e0201n1:1213: Samantabhāve-parivuto, parikkhitto, parikkhāro. Paricchede-pariññeyyaṃ, parijānāti. Vajjane-pariharati. Parihāro. Āliṅgane-parissajati. Nivāsane-vatthaṃ paridahati. Pūjāyaṃ-pāricariyā. Bhojane-parivisati. Abhibhave-paribhavati. Dosakkhāne-paribhāsati. Sesaṃ kārakakaṇḍe vakkhati.
anya-e0201n1:1214: Nīsaddo pana nīharaṇa, nīvaraṇādīsu vattati, nīharaṇaṃ, nīvaraṇaṃiccādi.
anya-e0201n1:1217: Niccaṃ ekarūpena vākyapathe patantīti nipātā. Padānaṃ ādi, majjhā’vasānesu nipatantīti nipātātipi vadanti.
anya-e0201n1:1218: Asatvavācakā cādisaddā nipātā nāma. Te pana vibhattiyuttā, ayuttā cāti duvidhā honti. Tattha vibhattiyuttā pubbe dassitā eva. Cādayo ayuttā nāma. Te pana anekasatappabhedā honti. Nighaṇṭusatthesu gahetabbāti.
anya-e0201n1:1220: Abyayataddhitapaccayantā nāma yathā, tathā, ekadhā, ekajjhaṃ, sabbaso, kathaṃ, itthaṃ iccādayo. Tehi tatiyālopo.
anya-e0201n1:1222: Tvādipaccayantā nāma katvā, katvāna, kātuna, kātuṃ, kātave, dakkhitāye, hetuye, ādāya, upādāya, viceyya, vineyya, sakkacca, āhacca, upasampajja, samecca, avecca, paṭicca, aticca, āgamma, ārabbhaiccādayo. Tesu tvā, tvānantehi paṭhamālopo. Tuṃ, tave, tāye, tuyepaccayantehi catutthīlopoti.
